citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:32 am on
October 26, 2021.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating no one was available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:32 am on 
October 26, 2021. 
 
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating no one was available for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
